text: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pe paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi vibhajissāmi
edit: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pe paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi vibhajissāmi

translations.transtext: [The Buddha] lives in Sāvatthī. ... [Said the Buddha], "monks, I will teach you the dependent origination, I will classify [it for you]."
